VEC.Q: How many lines are in this parallel-coordinates chart

SRP.Q: On the Moving time (hours) dimension, what is the spatial relationship of someone train relative to its ship in terms of vertical (above/below) direction?
SRP.A: {someone train} is {above} {its ship} on the Moving time (hours) dimension.

SRP.Q: Which dimension is the second position to the left of dimension Average speed (km/h)?
SRP.A: The second position to the left of Average speed (km/h) is {Loading/unloading time (hours)}.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Moving time (hours)} axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Idling time (minutes)} axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart.

VPR.Q: Which dimension has the highest variability in the parallel-coordinates chart?
VPR.A: {Total transit time (hours)} shows the highest variability.

VPR.Q: What kind of correlation exists between Average speed (km/h) and dimension Max speed (km/h)
VPR.A: There is {Strong Correlation} between Average speed (km/h) and Max speed (km/h).

VE.Q: What is the value of someone train on the Loading/unloading time (hours) dimension in the parallel-coordinates chart?
VE.A: The value of someone train on the Loading/unloading time (hours) dimension is {0.95}

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label race train across all dimensions in the parallel-coordinates chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of race train across all dimensions is {120.0}

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label test Cargo ship across all dimensions in the parallel-coordinates chart?

SC.Q: What is the average value of Average speed (km/h)?
SC.A: The average value of Average speed (km/h) is {67.96}

SC.Q: What is the difference in coding Idling time (minutes) between label movie Tram and label test Cargo ship

NC.Q: On Moving time (hours), which label has a higher score: someone train or role plane?
NC.A: {role plane} has a higher score on Moving time (hours).

NC.Q: On Total transit time (hours), which label has a higher score: interesting Tram or race train?
NC.A: {race train} has a higher score on Total transit time (hours).

MSR.Q: In the parallel coordinates plot, which dimension has the highest degree of dispersion?
MSR.A: The dimension with the highest degree of dispersion is {Total transit time (hours)}.
